name: politicox
description: An attempt at building a better politico app

scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test && npm run migration && mocha server/test/test.js --require @babel/register --require @babel/polyfill --exit
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-server
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.nyc: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.migration: babel-node server/app/model/migrations/dbIndex dropTables && babel-node server/app/model/migrations/dbIndex createTables && babel-node server/app/model/migrations/dbIndex seedTables

author: Chukwudi Ngwobia
